title: Snowman Paul at the CONCERT HALL
description: Snowman Paul dreams of becoming a famous musician. Dan is not sure his snowman has any musical talents. Still, Snowman Paul practices vigorously day and night, and no one can get any rest. Will Dan put an end to Paulâ€™s musical journey or will he join his snowman in his musical adventures?  And then Paul sang and I must say I wished that I were far away... I had to stop him in the middle. "Hey, Paul," I said. "Here is your fiddle!"
author: Yossi Lapid
